name: GoalStatusReason
description: Example codes indicating the reason for a current status.  Note that these are in no way complete and may not even be appropriate for some uses.

concept.definition: Goal suspended or ended because of a surgical procedure.
Goal suspended or ended because of a significant life event (marital change, bereavement, etc.).
Goal has been superseded by a new goal.
Patient wishes the goal to be set aside, at least temporarily.
